title: Viewability
description: Description of viewability measured properties of an advertisement

xdm:windowDepth.title: Window Depth
xdm:windowDepth.description: The number of iFrames the ad is displayed inside of.

xdm:viewportHeight.title: Viewport Height
xdm:viewportHeight.description: The number of vertical pixels of the window the ad is displayed in as measured by the viewability library.

xdm:viewportWidth.title: Viewport Width
xdm:viewportWidth.description: The number of horizontal pixels of the window the ad is displayed in as measured by the viewability library.

xdm:adHeight.title: Ad Height
xdm:adHeight.description: The number of vertical pixels of the player as measured by the viewability library. This can be larger than the size of the ad if the player has extra controls or thumbnails.

xdm:adWidth.title: Ad Width
xdm:adWidth.description: The number of horizontal pixels of the player as measured by the viewability library. This can be larger than the size of the ad if the player has extra controls or thumbnails.

xdm:playerVolume.title: Player Volume
xdm:playerVolume.description: The volume of the player was at video start.

xdm:viewabilityInstrumented.title: Viewabiltity Measurement Instrumented
xdm:viewabilityInstrumented.description: Whether or not viewability was enabled on for this ad instance.

xdm:version.title: Viewabiltity Library Version
xdm:version.description: The version of the library instrumented to measure viewability metrics.

xdm:viewable.title: Viewable Ad
xdm:viewable.description: Indicates whether ad was measured as viewable during ad play.

xdm:activeWindow.title: Active Window
xdm:activeWindow.description: Indicates whether ad was shown on active window on users' browser.

xdm:percentViewable.title: Percent Viewable
xdm:percentViewable.description: Percent of pixels in the ad deemed viewable at measurement time.
